name: Descenders
summary: Descenders is extreme downhill mountain biking for the modern era, with procedurally generated worlds, and where mistakes have real consequences. Will you lead your team to glory and become the next legendary Descender?
info:
• 中文名: 速降王者
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2019年5月7日
  • 开发: RageSquid
  • 发行: No More Robots
